summary.span: 提供 Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级项目中的 Sheetn 类的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the Sheet*n* classes in document-level projects for Microsoft Office Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是适用于基`Sheet` * n *通过使用 Visual Studio 创建的文档级 Excel 项目中的类。The class is the base class for the `Sheet`*n* classes in document-level Excel projects created by using Visual Studio. 使用`Sheet` * n *类以编程方式访问你的项目中的工作表。Use the `Sheet`*n* classes to programmatically access the worksheets in your project. 类是*主机项*表示文档级项目中的工作表。The class is a *host item* that represents a worksheet in document-level projects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[主机项和主机控件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md)和[工作表主机项](/visualstudio/vsto/worksheet-host-item.md)。For more information, see [Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md) and [Worksheet Host Item](/visualstudio/vsto/worksheet-host-item.md). 类提供相同的成员中 Excel 主互操作程序集，但它的类添加以下功能：The class provides the same members as the class in the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 将托管的控件添加到 Excel 工作表，或删除控件，在运行时，请使用此属性。Use this property to add managed controls to an Excel worksheet, or to remove controls, at run time. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性来获取基础工作表主机项的对象。Use this property to get the underlying object for a worksheet host item. - 方法。 method. 重写此方法以公开你的项目向工作表中的 VBA 代码中的类。Override this method to expose a class in your project to VBA code in the worksheet. - 文档级事件，如和，仅在 Excel 对象模型中的应用程序级别提供。Document-level events, such as and , that are provided only at the application level in the Excel object model. 也就是说，在 Excel 对象模型中，这些事件中定义类而不是类。That is, in the Excel object model, these events are defined in the class rather than the class. ## 创建工作表宿主项Creating Worksheet Host Items 无法创建以编程方式在 Office 项目中的对象。You cannot create objects programmatically in Office projects. 在文档级项目中， `Sheet` * n *类 (从其派生) 自动实例化[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]当最终用户打开工作簿。In document-level projects, the `Sheet`*n* classes (which derive from ) are instantiated automatically by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] when the end user opens the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建工作表主机项以编程方式使用`GetVstoObject`方法。In application-level projects, you can create worksheet host items programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 创建工作表主机项是对象，而不是对象。The worksheet host item you create is a object, rather than a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为`false`禁用筛选 (即，若要删除的筛选器下拉箭头)，但不能将其设置为`true`。You can set this property to `false` to disable filtering (that is, to remove the filter drop-down arrows), but you cannot set it to `true`. 启用筛选并创建筛选的列表，请使用方法对象，或使用方法对象。To enable filtering and create a filtered list, use the method of a object, or use the method of a object. 此属性仅指示是否启用筛选;它不指示是否要筛选的任何数据。This property indicates only whether filtering is enabled; it does not indicate whether any data is being filtered. 若要确定表是否正在主动筛选数据，请使用属性。To determine whether the worksheet is actively filtering data, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建水果中的筛选的列表，然后使用属性来显示列表的筛选条件。The following code example creates a filtered list of fruits in a , and then uses the property to display the filter criteria for the list. 然后，该示例提示用户关闭筛选器，通过使用属性，并且最后使用属性来显示工作表是否能筛选的列表。The example then prompts the user to turn off the filter by using the property, and finally uses the property to display whether the worksheet has a filtered list. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. span.span: Gets a object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.

value.span: 一个表示工作表上一个或多个列的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回对象，其中包含工作表上的所有列。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the columns on the worksheet. 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取工作表上的特定列。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific columns on the worksheet. 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|若要获取的一个或多个列的索引。The index of one or more columns to get.

若要获取的单个列，请将以下对象之一传递给此参数：To get a single column, pass one of the following objects to this parameter:

的一个整数，指定你想要获取的列的索引。- An integer that specifies the index of the column you want to get. 列索引从 1 开始。The column indexes begin at 1.
的你想要获取的列的字母组成字符串。- A string that consists of the letter of the column you want to get.

若要获取多个连续列，请传递与格式字符串"`first column letter`:`last column letter`"。To get multiple contiguous columns, pass a string with the format "`first column letter`:`last column letter`". 例如，若要获取列 A 到 E，传递"A:E"。For example, to get columns A through E, pass "A:E". **注意：** 此参数的名称有误导性; 此参数指定你想要获取，不是行的列的索引。**Note:** The name of this parameter is misleading; this parameter specifies the indexes of the columns you want to get, not the rows.| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 此属性将引发如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可以在第一列中设置颜色、 名称、 大小和加粗的字体的所有单元格，工作表上。The following code example uses the property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first column on the worksheet. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`false`，不会重新评估现有的条件格式。When the property is set to `false`, existing conditional formats will not be re-evaluated. 任何以前应用的条件格式设置将仍是可见的但不是会作为单元格的值更新或更改 AppliesTo 范围。Any previously applied conditional formatting will still be visible, but will not be updated as cell values or AppliesTo ranges are changed. 将此属性设置为`true`以对其进行评估之前完全配置一个规则。Set this property to `true` to configure a rule completely before evaluating it. 如果对其应用条件的范围很大，这可能导致性能增加。This can result in a performance increase if the range over which the condition is applied is large.

span.span: Use this method to paste data from other applications or to paste data in a specific format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不知道要传递给该格式参数的字符串，则可以查看尝试在 Excel 中的粘贴命令与在剪贴板上的数据兼容的字符串。If you do not know which string to pass to the Format parameter, you can view the strings that are compatible with the data on the Clipboard by trying the paste command in Excel . 将数据复制到剪贴板，使用**选择性粘贴**在 Excel 中，命令，然后查看中列出的格式**选择性粘贴**对话框。Copy the data to the Clipboard, use the **Paste Special** command in Excel, and then view the formats listed in the **Paste Special** dialog box. `NoHTMLFormatting` 将仅一回事时`Format`="HTML"。`NoHTMLFormatting` will only matter when `Format` = "HTML". 在所有其他情况下，`NoHTMLFormatting`将被忽略。In all other cases, `NoHTMLFormatting` will be ignored. 使用此方法之前，您必须选择目标范围。You must select the destination range before you use this method. 此方法可以修改表的选定区域，具体取决于剪贴板的内容。This method might modify the sheet selection, depending on the contents of the Clipboard. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 HTML 放置到剪贴板，然后使用方法以将剪贴板内容粘贴到 A1 单元格。The following code example places HTML onto the Clipboard and then uses the method to paste the contents of the Clipboard into cell A1. 请注意此示例选择之前调用范围方法。Note that the example selects the range before calling the method. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#106](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/CS/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet.cs#106)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#106](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/VB/Sheet1.vb#106)]

summary.span: 在对数据透视表内的单元格或单元格范围进行编辑或重新计算（针对包含公式的单元格）后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a cell or range of cells inside a PivotTable are edited or recalculated (for cells that contain formulas).

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不会在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下发生。The event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells. 例如，它时不会出现数据透视表是刷新、 排序、 筛选，或向下钻取，即使这些操作移动单元格，并可能从 OLAP 数据源中检索新值。For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句以将所有更改都应用到数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源之前, 和用户已选择的用户界面以都应用更改后立即时发生事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在针对 OLAP 数据源提交数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are committed against the OLAP data source for a PivotTable.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，提交事务之前，用户已选择为整个数据透视表中保存更改后立即发生的事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 执行针对 OLAP 数据源，ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句，如果在事务仍处于活动状态，且然后用户已选择放弃所做的更改之后将丢弃所有数据透视表中, 编辑过的值之前立即发生。Occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在对数据透视表进行更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs after changes to a PivotTable.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 过程中发生的大多数更改在数据透视表，以便你可以编写代码以响应用户操作，例如清除、 分组或刷新数据透视表中的项。The occurs during most changes to a PivotTable, so that you can write code to respond to user actions, such as clearing, grouping, or refreshing items in the PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

span.span: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 保护工作表使其无法修改。

span.span: Protects a worksheet so that it cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将应用此方法与`UserInterfaceOnly`参数设置为`true`以及然后保存该工作簿，整张工作表 （而不仅仅是接口） 将完全保护时重新打开工作簿。If you apply this method with the `UserInterfaceOnly` argument set to `true` and then save the workbook, the entire worksheet (not just the interface) will be fully protected when you reopen the workbook. 若要打开工作簿后，重新启用用户界面保护，必须再次应用使用此方法`UserInterfaceOnly`设置为`true`。To re-enable the user interface protection after the workbook is opened, you must again apply this method with `UserInterfaceOnly` set to `true`. 可对受保护工作表进行更改，如果提供密码。It is possible to make changes to a protected worksheet if the password is supplied. 此外，另一种方法将取消保护工作表，进行必要的更改，然后然后再次保护工作表。Also, another method would be to unprotect the worksheet, make the necessary changes, and then protect the worksheet again. > [!NOTE] > 未受保护，则表示可能会锁定该单元格 (**设置单元格格式**对话框)，但包括在中定义的范围**允许用户编辑范围**对话框中，并且用户已取消保护具有密码的范围或已验证通过 NT 权限。'Unprotected' means the cell may be locked (**Format Cells** dialog) but is included in a range defined in the **Allow Users to Edit Ranges** dialog, and the user has unprotected the range with a password or been validated via NT permissions. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取的值属性以确定是否受保护工作表内容。The following code example gets the value of the property to determine whether the contents of the worksheet are protected. 如果内容未受保护，则方法调用与`Contents`参数设置为`true`以便保护内容。If the contents are unprotected, then the method is called with the `Contents` parameter set to `true` so that the contents are protected. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Cell1`|采用应用程序语言的以 A1 样式表示法表示的范围名称。The name of the range in A1-style notation in the language of the application. 范围名称可以包括范围运算符（冒号）、交集运算符（空格）或并集运算符（逗号）。It can include the range operator (a colon), the intersection operator (a space), or the union operator (a comma). 范围名称还可以包括货币符号，但是这些符号被忽略。It can also include dollar signs, but they are ignored. 可以在范围的任何部分中使用本地定义的名称。You can use a local defined name in any part of the range. 如果使用一个名称，则假定该名称使用的是应用程序的语言。If you use a name, the name is assumed to be in the language of the application. 此参数是必需的。This parameter is required.| |`Cell2`|范围右下角的单元格。The cell in the lower-right corner of the range. 可以是一个包含单个单元格、整列、整行的 ，或者可以是一个以应用程序的语言命名单个单元格的字符串。Can be a that contains a single cell, an entire column, an entire row, or it can be a string that names a single cell in the language of the application. 此参数在 Visual Basic 中是可选的。This parameter is optional in Visual Basic.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用不同方式属性来访问单个或多个单元格。The following code example demonstrates different ways to use the property to access a single cell or multiple cells. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#42](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/CS/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet.cs#42)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#42](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/VB/Sheet1.vb#42)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回对象，其中包含工作表上的所有行。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the rows on the worksheet. 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取工作表上的特定行。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific rows on the worksheet. 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|若要获取的一个或多个行的索引。The index of one or more rows to get.

若要获取单个行，请传递一个整数，指定你想要获取的行的索引。To get a single row, pass an integer that specifies the index of the row you want to get. 从 1 开始的行索引。The row indexes begin at 1.

若要获取多个连续行，请传递与格式字符串"`first row`:`last row`"。To get multiple contiguous rows, pass a string with the format "`first row`:`last row`". 例如，若要获取行 1 至 5，可传递"1:5"。For example, to get rows 1 through 5, pass "1:5".| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 此属性将引发如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置颜色、 名称、 大小和加粗的字体的所有单元格的前五个行中，工作表上。The following code example uses the property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first five rows on the worksheet. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project.
